content: {A笑眯眯}Whenever I find an unknown type of Kabutomaru, I take it to Dr. Mors. He knows everything — he's incredibly amazing!

content: {A加油}But if he'd just lift that "one visit per day" rule in the Omni-Gallery, I'd gladly call him "Lord Kabutomaru"!

content: {A加油}But more than getting Dr. Mors's permission, beating his moon crab is what really matters. <style=SizeSmall>Haven't won a single time yet, but I'm not giving up!</style>
